channel.title: ts on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ts on Barefoot Rob

item.title: new style TS lessons
item.description: 17:56 Thursday 16 November 2017 JST Mutsumi introduced a new style lesson format where the guides sit down together with me instead of just having individual lessons. Hopefully this will help them improve listening skills by listening to other people have conversations in English. I showed mt3s.robnugen.com to Miyako and Ayaka. Miyako showed me pics from her trip to the US with Haruka.
